share_info.tips: #JDG经理疑曝Kanavi态度有问题#的相关内容，来智搜看看

response.share_text: #JDG经理疑曝Kanavi态度有问题#的相关内容，来智搜看看
response.msg:
嗯，用户想了解关于JDG经理疑似曝光Kanavi态度问题的信息。看了看搜索结果，发现这其实是个挺复杂的事件，涉及多个层面，包括比赛表现、历史记录和赛区问题。

用户可能既是电竞粉丝又关注行业动态，想全面了解事件真相和各方观点。需要客观呈现事实，同时分析深层原因。

从这些搜索结果看，有几个关键点值得关注：首先是疑似JDG经理蓝莲花的聊天记录被曝光，里面提到Kanavi态度问题，比如不能批评他，还要求高价床垫。不过有人指出这是2023年的旧记录，Kanavi本人曾否认过床垫的事。

再看Kanavi在S15的表现确实不太好，三局比赛7-14-6的战绩，多次关键失误，比如第三局抢了JKL德莱文的人头，小龙团空大等。而且这不是第一次对T1发挥失常，2023年四局累计10-20-19的数据也很差。

业内评价呈现两极化，朱开教练明确表示不要“世界赛软的选手”，但也有观点认为失败是团队问题，不能全怪个人。有意思的是后台视频显示369痛哭时Kanavi疑似憋笑，这个细节被很多网友讨论。

更深层看，这反映了LPL赛区的结构性问题：过度依赖韩援，本土培养不足，抗压能力差。像网友说的“不买韩援难进世界赛，买了又遇外战软脚虾”。

时间线上，11月3日比赛失利后旧料被翻出，次日Kanavi道歉但被指不够诚恳。舆论分化明显，有要求严惩的，也有呼吁理性看待的。

考虑从几个方面来组织回答：事件起源（聊天记录和比赛表现）、舆论反应（业内和网友观点）、时间线梳理、以及反映的LPL深层次问题。最后给出中立客观的总结，既承认Kanavi的表现问题，也指出团队和赛区的责任。


关于“JDG经理疑曝Kanavi态度有问题”事件，综合多方信息及核心争议点梳理如下：
### 一、事件起源：聊天记录与赛场表现双重发酵
1. **聊天记录曝光内容**
- 网传疑似前JDG经理“蓝莲花”的聊天记录称，Kanavi存在职业态度问题，具体包括：
- **管理难度大**：需避免施压或批评，“不能PUA他，因为合同有约束”；```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 6, "data": {"num": [13, 22], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "小野的瓜田", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229039029587375", "index": 13, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "LOL电竞小胖", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229031273529749", "index": 22, "label": ""}], "name": "小野的瓜田", "img": "https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.50/008xCJoDly8hrq6l9fi5wj30u00u03yx.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762212789&ssig=WdC3T%2BwBiy", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229039029587375", "vType": 0}}```
- **特殊要求**：被曝曾要求俱乐部购买单价20万元的床垫（团队6人预算达120万元），理由为“床太硬影响发挥”。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 7, "data": {"num": [13, 25], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "小泽吃瓜", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228974508871514", "index": 25, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "小野的瓜田", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229039029587375", "index": 13, "label": ""}], "name": "小泽吃瓜", "img": "https://tvax4.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.600.600.50/9b02e1ebly8hvu20unca2j20go0goq3q.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762212789&ssig=Qtk0m6jwwo", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228974508871514", "vType": 0}}```
- **真实性存疑**：该记录为2023年旧内容，且Kanavi此前已辟谣“20万床垫”说法，JDG官方未回应。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 8, "data": {"num": [12, 29], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "快乐大金子", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229026002077259", "index": 29, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "王玮晨", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229024021315889", "index": 12, "label": ""}], "name": "快乐大金子", "img": "https://tvax2.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.50/007SWPUQly8hnqyyp5p34j30u00u0n0d.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762212789&ssig=IPoqNhncFN", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229026002077259", "vType": 0}}```

2. **S15半决赛关键失误引发舆论反弹**
- **数据表现**：TES对阵T1的比赛中，Kanavi三局累计战绩7-14-6，资源控制率极低（如28分钟放四条小龙）；```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 10, "data": {"num": [1], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "新浪新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228982770604680", "index": 1, "label": ""}]}}```
- **致命操作**：第三局天肥开局却配合失误，导致JKL德莱文未能提款；后续龙团被秒、小龙团空大，直接断送优势；```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 11, "data": {"num": [1, 10], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "弹幕教练鳗鱼", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229026798472682", "index": 10, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "新浪新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228982770604680", "index": 1, "label": ""}], "name": "弹幕教练鳗鱼", "img": "https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.511.511.50/9aaa639fly8i2djq6fnh5j20e70e73yk.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762212789&ssig=74MDK0%2BBO%2B", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229026798472682", "vType": 0}}```
- **历史相似性**：近三年S赛对阵T1均表现低迷（如2023年四局累计10-20-19）。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 12, "data": {"num": [1], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "新浪新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228982770604680", "index": 1, "label": ""}]}}```
小泽吃瓜
小野的瓜田
新浪新闻
弹幕教练鳗鱼

### 二、舆论分化：职业态度争议与赛区矛盾
1. **质疑声音：态度问题与稳定性缺失**
- 前教练朱开公开表示：“不会要世界赛表现软的选手”，并点名Kanavi“联赛无敌，世界赛遇韩国队就玩不了”；```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 16, "data": {"num": [5], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "我是电竞小生", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229010771774524", "index": 5, "label": "大v"}], "name": "我是电竞小生", "img": "https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.600.600.50/006BPLKbly8gx4n5qvexbj30go0gogp4.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762212789&ssig=9sIb8K7H5B", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229010771774524", "vType": 0}}```
- 网友批评其“精忠报国型选手”，对LCK战队屡现离奇失误；```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 17, "data": {"num": [21], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "我是搞机侠", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229032364839201", "index": 21, "label": ""}]}}```
- TES淘汰赛后台视频显示，369痛哭时Kanavi被指“疑似憋笑”，与队友情绪形成反差。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 18, "data": {"num": [9, 26], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "电竞兔儿爷", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228899770042549", "index": 26, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "游戏小菌菌", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229056707790173", "index": 9, "label": ""}], "name": "电竞兔儿爷", "img": "https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.596.596.50/006lZF5kly8h8xaaghc1bj30gk0gk3zd.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762212789&ssig=GSdeTqOaNd", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228899770042549", "vType": 0}}```

2. **反驳观点：团队责任与旧料炒作**
- 理性声音指出：TES失利为团队短板叠加（如辅助符文错误、BP失误），非一人之责；```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 20, "data": {"num": [23], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "番茄鱼_999", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229033491267849", "index": 23, "label": ""}]}}```
- 前JDG粉丝透露，Kanavi在JDG时期已是“太子爷待遇”，世界赛问题早有迹象；```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 21, "data": {"num": [22, 24], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "LOL电竞小胖", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229031273529749", "index": 22, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "-渡旧火-", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229035538878574", "index": 24, "label": ""}], "name": "LOL电竞小胖", "img": "https://tvax4.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.50/008hQ91rly8gpjmgs8z03j30u00u00v6.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762212789&ssig=jh3xqY5MdA", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229031273529749", "vType": 0}}```
- 业内质疑旧聊天记录被翻炒是“墙倒众人推”。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 22, "data": {"num": [12, 22, 29], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "王玮晨", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229024021315889", "index": 12, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "LOL电竞小胖", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229031273529749", "index": 22, "label": ""}, {"name": "快乐大金子", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229026002077259", "index": 29, "label": ""}], "name": "王玮晨", "img": "https://tvax4.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.480.480.50/005SyZ1Sly8i3tl9bvkkkj30dc0dc3yz.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762212789&ssig=%2Ba3T9TFvf0", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229024021315889", "vType": 0}}```
我是电竞小生
电竞兔儿爷
游戏小菌菌

### 三、事件本质：LPL赛区结构性困境的缩影
1. **韩援依赖矛盾**
- 网友尖锐指出：“不买韩援恐难进世界赛，买了又屡现‘外战软脚虾’”，2025年TES全年对LCK战绩0胜15负印证此困境；
- 对比本土打野（如Ning、Tian）的S赛高光，韩援稳定性引发信任危机。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 27, "data": {"num": [5, 21], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "我是电竞小生", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229010771774524", "index": 5, "label": ""}, {"name": "我是搞机侠", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229032364839201", "index": 21, "label": ""}]}}```

2. **赛训体系缺陷**
- 青训断层、老将垄断导致新人难出头，与LCK频繁涌现新人（如Zeus、Keria）形成对比；```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 29, "data": {"num": [16, 27], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "救援先锋玄德公", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229033358885218", "index": 27, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "Clownyx", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229023946870395", "index": 16, "label": ""}], "name": "救援先锋玄德公", "img": "https://tvax4.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.50/0072XFzhly8h98u2ivzp6j30u00u0dhy.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762212789&ssig=KG2xQOncq0", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229033358885218", "vType": 0}}```
- 业内呼吁反思“重韩援轻本土培养”“世界赛抗压训练不足”等深层问题。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 30, "data": {"num": [23, 24], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "番茄鱼_999", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229033491267849", "index": 23, "label": ""}, {"name": "-渡旧火-", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229035538878574", "index": 24, "label": ""}]}}```
### 四、时间线梳理与最新动态
- **11月3日**：比赛失利后，旧聊天记录被翻出冲上热搜；```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 33, "data": {"num": [1, 12], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "新浪新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228982770604680", "index": 1, "label": ""}, {"name": "王玮晨", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229024021315889", "index": 12, "label": ""}]}}```
- **11月4日**：Kanavi受访道歉称“发挥不佳，希望LPL后续突破T1”，但表情管理再引争议；```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 34, "data": {"num": [9, 20], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "游戏小菌菌", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229056707790173", "index": 9, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "青涩胶带", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229017809555574", "index": 20, "label": ""}], "name": "游戏小菌菌", "img": "https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.512.512.50/007oe89aly8gg91p5bjkpj30e80e8q35.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762212789&ssig=NF80i%2FoIWM", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229056707790173", "vType": 0}}```
- **业内动向**：红米教练暗示或返LCK，加剧“选手教练组离心”猜测。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 35, "data": {"num": [26], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "电竞兔儿爷", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228899770042549", "index": 26, "label": ""}]}}```
### 总结
Kanavi的争议是职业态度质疑、赛场表现滑坡及LPL赛区矛盾的集中爆发。尽管网传聊天记录真实性存疑且时效滞后，但其S赛关键局屡次低迷已成事实。舆论需避免简化归咎个体，而应推动赛区从青训造血、抗压训练及管理专业化等维度破局。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 37, "data": {"num": [23, 24], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "番茄鱼_999", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229033491267849", "index": 23, "label": ""}, {"name": "-渡旧火-", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229035538878574", "index": 24, "label": ""}]}}```
